title: Show 'No Device Connected' state instead of demo data

requirements.text: Update SimulationControl component to display a prominent 'No Device Connected' status when no real sensor reading has been received from the ESP32 hardware, instead of showing a syncing or active state.

quotes: update the app so it clearly shows a 'No Device Connected' message instead of showing fake data until your real hardware is connected

acceptanceCriteria: SimulationControl shows 'No Device Connected' indicator when latest reading is null or absent
The indicator is visually distinct (e.g., grey/muted color) compared to the active connected state

requirements.text: Remove all hardcoded/simulated demo sensor data from useQueries.ts (or wherever default mock values are injected). When no real reading exists, all data values must be null/undefined rather than fake numbers.

quotes: fake demo data, just for preview
After you build the tile and connect ESP32 = real live data from your footsteps

acceptanceCriteria: No mock or hardcoded voltage, current, energy, footstep, or battery values are returned when the backend has no stored reading
React Query hooks return null/undefined for all sensor fields when no reading is available

requirements.text: Update all dashboard panel components (SensorDataPanel, SensorReadingCards, AnalyticsCharts, BatteryLevelPanel, USBOutputStatusPanel, AIDecisionPanel, EnergyFlowDiagram, HexagonTilePanel) to render a clear 'No Device Connected' or 'Awaiting Hardware' placeholder state — instead of zeroed-out or default values — when sensor data is null/absent.

quotes: shows a 'No Device Connected' message instead of displaying fake demo data
The dashboard will only show real data once your ESP32 hardware is connected

acceptanceCriteria: Each panel displays a 'No Device Connected' or equivalent placeholder message when data is null
No panel shows '0', '0%', or other misleading default values when hardware is not connected
When real data arrives from the backend, panels switch to displaying actual readings automatically

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo data schema or API — the fix is frontend-only
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding any new backend endpoints or data submission logic
Changing the visual theme or layout of the dashboard
